sentences.en: a huge collection of antique metalwork
After over ten years of work, continuous market exploration anf accumulation, Xinlijian metalwork Co.
sentences.cn: 历经十几载风雨, 不断的市场搜索与积累下形成新力健金属制品有限公司自身的经营特色.

sentences.en: Description : A metal and heavy cloth hauberk with elaborate metalwork along the chest.
sentences.cn: 胸部带着精心制作的金属制成的一款用金属和重的布质锁子甲.

sentences.en: He was a crafts-man in metalwork from Dresden.
sentences.cn: 他是来自德累斯顿的金工工匠。

sentences.en: Many are employed in the prison's wood and metalwork factories.
sentences.cn: 许多人受雇于监狱的木材和金属加工厂。

sentences.en: Metalwork: Useful and decorative objects fashioned of various metals.
sentences.cn: 金属制品: 用各种金属制成的有用的和装饰性的物品.

sentences.en: Rust and flaking paint mean the metalwork is in poor condition.
sentences.cn: 生锈和掉漆说明金属配件损毁严重。

sentences.en: Shaped by hammering with tools. Used chiefly of metals or metalwork.
sentences.cn: 锻造的用工具锤炼而成形的.

sentences.en: The collection includes ceramics, sculpture, paintings , calligraphy, textiles, and metalwork.
sentences.cn: 收藏品包括陶器 、 刻 、 画、法 、 织品和金属制品.

sentences.en: There are 25 enterprises including Metalwork Company, Hongda Steel Production Limited Company, etc.
sentences.cn: 金属制品有揭东试验区泰丰侨金属制品有限公司, 宏达不锈钢制品有限公司等25家.

sentences.en: There were bullet holes in the metalwork.
sentences.cn: 那件金属制品上有许多弹孔.

words.tran_cn: 金属工人；制金属品工人
